name: Login with facebook account to see picture REMOVER
description: Some sites requires from you to login with Facebook account to see a funny picture. The some sites that uses this are pikstra.com, gagznlolz.com and ultimate-pictures.org.
additional_info:
Changelog:
v1:
 - remove "login with facebook" from pikstra.com site
v1.1:
 - remove "Are you over 13? Login using your facebook account to verify your age" from gagznlolz.com site
v1.2:
 - remove "Are you over 13? This photo may not be suitble for children. Please login to verify your age." from ultimate-pictures.org site

Suggestions are always welcome
